_comment: This is a template for creating new region configuration files.
_usage: Copy this to regions/[your_region_id]/config.json and customize the values.
description: A brief description of this region (e.g., 'Bird data for Example County, covering the greater Example City area')

paths._comment: Optional: Override default file path patterns. Use {region_id} as placeholder.

thresholds._comment: Optional: Override algorithm thresholds for this region. Leave empty to use global defaults from constants.py

seasonal_weeks._comment: Optional: Override seasonal week ranges for this region (useful for different latitudes)

display_settings.about_text: BirdFinder helps you discover which birds are present throughout the year.
